description.@en: With a ‘whoosh’, a wind is drawn from the Æthereal Veil to blow things about.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can conjure a gust of wind which instantly extinguishes candles, blows papers about and tosses blankets around.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but instead the wind can be directed to open an unlocked door or move a heavy object no larger than a carriage.

criticalFailure.@en: A sudden gale of wind blows you over, as you are knocked Prone.

reagents.@en: The breath of a chaste woman, contained in a jar (expended)

system.distance: Any one object you can see
